dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and shading.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "kilomètres".
Includes legend in lower left corner: [Colonial possessions].
Shows topography, vegetation (including deserts and oases), drainage, colonial possessions, islands surrounding continent.
"Atlas général par J. Perthes No. 17" at top right margin.
Profile view comparing elevations of mountains.
